i LOVEEEEEEEEEE being able to find movies at 400 MB!! So i REALLY want to thank you for uploading it at this size!! So many people just assume everyone wants some huge 1.13 GB download, but for me and my connection - and many others!, 400 MB is AWESOME! And the quality was really lovely! 
MUCH appreciation man.....

Hi Pluto666! 
I'm having an issue with the audio, however only with the "talking" audio - music audio seems fine. I can't hear when actors are talking when playback, what can I do to fix this?
I'm a newbie at this, can you please advise?
Thank you! :)

P.S. Tried to use 3 players:

- Media Player Classic Home Cinema - "talking" audio very low, scratchy and/or distorted;
- DivX Plus Player - no "talking" audio
- VLC media player
